biotools.summary: Atom Pair-Based Scoring function (APBScore) is a physical-based scoring function, which includes pairwise van der Waals (VDW), electrostatic interaction, and hydrogen bond energies between the receptor and ligand.

bioschemas.name: APBScore
bioschemas.summary: Atom Pair-Based Scoring function (APBScore) is a physical-based scoring function, which includes pairwise van der Waals (VDW), electrostatic interaction, and hydrogen bond energies between the receptor and ligand.
